src:
Strašan duel Džejms – Dončić, Bobi igrao, Netsi srušili Rokitse [VIDEO]
02 Nov 2019, 09:47 by Milos
Protekle noći u NBA ligi odigrano je osam utakmica.
LA Lejkersi slavili su na gostovanju u Teksasu protiv Dalas Maveriksa i to posle produžetka, koji je Lejkersima obezbedio Deni Grin u poslednjoj sekundi.
Susret je obeležilo nadmetanje Lebrona Džejmsa i Luke Dončića. Obojica su ostvarili tripl-dabl učinak. Kralj LeBron je zabeležio 39 poena, 12 skokova i 16 uspešnih dodovanja, dok je Dončić upisao 31 poen, 13 uhvaćenih lopti i 15 asistencija uhvaćenih lopti.
Prvi zvaničan nastup u ekipi Dalasa upisao je Boban Marjanović, koji je za za 11 minuta postigao četiri poena, uz sedam skokova.



Bruklin je nadvisio Hjuston Rokitse na domaćem terenu.
Najzaslužniji za pobedu Netsa bio je Torian Prins sa 27 poena i 12 skokova, Karis Levert je ubacio 25, dok je Kajri Irving dodao 22 uz 10 asistencija.
Kod Hjustona Džejms Harden je postigao 36 poena, ali uz loš procenat šuta iz igre (10/31, 2/16 za tri), dok je Rasel Vestbruk nanizao 27 poena, osam skokova I sedam asistencija.



Boston je porazio Njujork u Masačusetsu, a junak trijumfa bio je Džejson Tejtum, koji je postigao pobedonosne poene.
Kod domaćih se istakao Kemba Voker sa 33 poena, dok je Tejtum dodao 22, U ekipi Njujorka odličan je bio Markus Moris sa 29 poena i devet skokova.



Bruklin – Hjuston 123:116Indijana – Klivlend 102:95Orlando – Milvoki 91:123Boston – Njujork 104:102Čikago – Detroit 112:106Dalas – Los Anđeles Lejkers 110:119 (produžetak)Sakramento – Juta 102:101Golden Stejt – San Antonio 110:127

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Awesome James - Doncic duel, Bobby played, Nets knock down Rokits [VIDEO]
02 Nov 2019, 09:47 by Milos
Last night, eight games were played in the NBA.
The LA Lakers celebrated a guest appearance in Texas against the Dallas Mavericks after the overtime, which the Lakers provided for Danny Green at the last second.
The meeting was marked by a competition between Lebron James and Luka Doncic. Both achieved a triple-double effect. King LeBron recorded 39 points, 12 rebounds and 16 successful touchdowns, while Doncic recorded 31 points, 13 caught balls and 15 assists caught.
The first official appearance on the Dallas team was scored by Boban Marjanovic, who scored four points in 11 minutes with seven rebounds.



Brooklyn outscored the Houston Rockets on home turf.
Most deserving of the Nets' win was the Torian Prins with 27 points and 12 rebounds, Karis Levert notched 25, while Kiri Irving added 22 with 10 assists.
At Houston, James Harden scored 36 points, but with a poor shot percentage (10/31, 2/16 for three), while Russell Westbrook scored 27 points, eight rebounds and seven assists.



Boston defeated New York, Massachusetts, and the hero of the triumph was Jason Tateum, who scored the winning points.
The home side stood out with Kemba Walker with 33 points, while Tateum added 22, Markus Morris with 29 points and nine rebounds excelled in the New York team.



Brooklyn - Houston 123: 116Indiana - Cleveland 102: 95Orlando - Milwaukee 91: 123Boston - New York 104: 102Chicago - Detroit 112: 106Dallas - Los Angeles Lakers 110: 119 (extension) Sacramento - Utah 102: 101Golden State - San Antonio 110: 127
